about_the_game:
Overview

Embark on an enchanting journey in a medieval fairytale land, where you take on the roles of two main characters, Red Riding Hood and Bo-Peep. Each begins their own adventure, eventually uniting to unravel a sinister plot that threatens to seize the magical well hidden deep in the heart of Essenwoods, a well containing the very essence of magic in the land.

Guided by the Fairy Godmother, who granted them wishes, bestowing upon each a unique magical item, our brave heroes venture forth. They confront wolves and other creatures tainted by dark magic, utilizing their special abilities to solve puzzles, unveil secrets, and overcome obstacles strewn across their path.

Features

  • Dual Protagonists:Immerse yourself in the roles of two main characters, Red Riding Hood and Bo-Peep, each embarking on their distinct adventures. Additionally, encounter a variety of other playable characters in brief yet impactful scenes.

  • Unique Character Abilities:Every character possesses exclusive abilities, vital tools to navigate the challenges of their individual journeys. Your mastery of these unique skills is key to progressing through the game.

  • Dynamic Character Control:Become the master of both worlds! Once you've honed the abilities of each character, seamlessly switch between Red Riding Hood and Bo-Peep. Navigate this duo through puzzles and obstacles, showcasing the synergy between their strengths.


  • Fantasy Realism Art Style:Immerse yourself in a visually stunning world with a fantasy realism art style. Let the enchanting visuals captivate and intrigue you as you explore numerous open levels, each with its own unique charm.

  • Battle mutated creatures :Encounter creatures tainted by dark magic and use your unique abilities to overcome them. You might even meet an unexpected friend.


  • Puzzles and Obstacles:Challenge your intellect and creativity! Encounter puzzles and obstacles that will put your problem-solving skills to the test. Every twist and turn in the game promises a new opportunity to showcase your strategic thinking.


Visit our website for further information

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 or Intel Core I5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1010/1030 2GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: The Game has 4 Graphics Settings and should be able to run on much lower spec PC's. Try the free demo to confirm.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 or Intel Core I7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1650 4GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: The Game has 4 Graphics Settings and should be able to run on much lower spec PC's. Try the free demo to confirm.
